issue.subject: Add GitHub Workflows for GitLab Sync
issue.description:
Implement GitHub Actions workflows to mirror GitLab CI/CD pipeline and sync repositories.

## Requirements

1. Create main CI/CD workflow that mirrors GitLab pipeline
2. Implement GitHub to GitLab sync workflow
3. Implement GitLab to GitHub sync workflow
4. Document the setup and usage

## Implementation
See attached file: rmcp-github-workflows.md
